comment: The "jew haters" have been banned from most other platforms, so they came here. They are basically folks that struggle to understand what's happening in society, so to simplify things for their minds they resort to "apophenia", "affect heuristic", and "confirmation bias" to process their world view. In a nutshell, resort to the favorite tactic of the left and blame a race for the world's problems.

In a nutshell, resort to the favorite tactic of the left and blame a race for the world's problems.

                        :ARG4 (h2 / here))))
      :snt2 (f / folk

                  :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01

                              :ARG0 f
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (a2 / acophenia)
                                    :op2 (a3 / affect-01
                                          :ARG0 f
                                          :ARG1 (h3 / heuristic))
                                    :op3 (b3 / bias-01
                                          :ARG0 f
                                          :ARG1-of (c4 / confirm-01)))
                              :purpose (p3 / process-01
                                    :ARG0 f
                                    :ARG1 (v / view-02
                                          :ARG0 f
                                          :ARG1 (w / world))))))
            :snt3 (r3 / resort-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :part (m3 / mind))
            :ARG1 (t2 / tactic
                  :mod (f2 / favorite)
                  :poss (l / left-19))
            :ARG2 (b4 / blame-01
                  :ARG0 t

comment: Sad, but so true. Jew haters are a sad lot, there is much they need to learn. No group is better or worse; its all about the values that individuals have & live by. Charles Manson was white, but I doubt that many hold him up as a model of the value of "white supremacism" It works both ways.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s / sad-02)
            :ARG2 (t / true-01
                  :degree (s2 / so)))
      :snt2 (s3 / sad-02
            :ARG1 (p / person

                                    :op1 "Jew"))))
            :degree (l / lot))

            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG2 (g / group)))
            :ARG1 (l2 / learn-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (m2 / much)))
      :snt4 (c2 / concern-02
            :ARG0 (ii2 / it)
            :ARG1 (v / value
                  :ARG1-of (h2 / have-03
                        :ARG0 (ii3 / individual))
                  :ARG1-of (l3 / live-01
                        :ARG0 ii3))
            :degree (a / all))
      :snt5 c
      :ARG1 (w / white-02
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Charles"
                        :op2 "Manson")))
      :ARG2 (d / doubt-01

                  :ARG0 (m3 / many)
                  :ARG1 p3

                              :ARG1 (s4 / supremacy
                                    :mod (w2 / white-02))))))
      :snt6 (w3 / work-09
            :ARG1 ii2)
      :manner (w4 / way
            :mod (b / both)))
